comment: in ando1982preliminary, development is described briefly and it is said that future work will describe the species in more detail but we were unable to find the subsequent study; although it seems like this species can undergo diapause, it doesn't appear that the staging table in ando1982preliminary is based on an individual that underwent diapause, even though embryogenesis is very slow; waiting for nagashima1982life

name: Ganaspis_xanthopoda
comment: parasitoid of Drosophila melanogaster - could be a good system for study; interval between mitosis is estimated as the mean of first two divisions; small egg wtih relatively large nuclei
